last_episode_to_air.name: There Goes the Neighborhood Part III
last_episode_to_air.overview: Sally makes a major sacrifice to keep her vision from coming true; Aidan fights to destroy the evil spirit; Josh and Nora think carefully about their future.

name: Being Human
overview: Three paranormal roommates, a ghost, a vampire, and a werewolf, struggle to keep their dark secrets from the world, while helping each other navigate the complexities of living double lives.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Aidan was a Revolutionary War soldier who sacrificed himself to vampires to spare his men. Now, some 260 years later, he is still struggling to escape the orbit of his powerful mentor, Bishop. Josh was a promising medical student forced to abandon his family and future after a werewolf attack left him cursed. And Sally, happily engaged before her tragic death, must now figure out how to move on as a ghost.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Aidan tries to steer a leaderless Boston while resisting his deadlier vampire instincts as he finds himself tempted and tormented by a figure from his past. Sally must face the consequences of missing her door while figuring out how to navigate life on earth as a ghost. Josh searches for a cure for his condition while struggling to maintain his relationship with Nora and, like the rest of his roommates, trying to build a future for himself beyond simply being a monster.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: Returning from limbo leaves Sally with more baggage than she bargained for, as well as new abilities that prove to be both a blessing and a curse. Josh deals with the consequences of attempting to lift his werewolf curse and his life is further complicated when an ominous visitor comes to Boston looking for him and Nora. Aidan resurfaces from being grounded and finds the vampire community vastly changed; he must find a new approach to feeding that will change his life forever.

seasons.name: Season 4
seasons.overview: Sally struggles to contain her newly acquired powers and break free of Donna's hold on her, while also seeking out the truth behind a murder mystery that haunts her when her powers are used.

episodes.name: There Goes the Neighborhood (1)
episodes.overview: Josh is miserable after his latest full moon transformation resulted in him waking up next to a bloody dead deer in the woods. Aidan suggests that he and Josh should live together so they can watch out for each other. When they've found the perfect apartment, they realise the place comes with its own ghost, Sally

episodes.name: There Goes the Neighborhood (2)
episodes.overview: Sally begs the guys to call Danny over so she can try to make him see her presence somehow. Aidan, while trying to fight off Cara's unwanted admiration, receives some shocking news about someone who he thought was dead. Josh discovers Aidan's involvement in the Rebecca incident and confronts him about it; at the same time, Josh is also struggling with whether to tell his sister the truth about himself.

episodes.name: Something To Watch Over Me
episodes.overview: Sally meets a ghostly new friend who teaches her how to cross physical boundaries like the apartment. Josh gets roped into the Neighborhood Watch against his wishes. Aidan is recognised by the son of one of his past victims, who is determined to confront Aidan about his father's murder.

episodes.name: Wouldn't It Be Nice (If We Were Human)
episodes.overview: Josh meets a werewolf who teaches him how to accept the change and is more than meets the eye. Aidan begins a dangerous relationship with an acquaintance. Sally learns that she needs to stop interfering in the lives of those she left behind.

episodes.name: The End of the World as We Knew It
episodes.overview: Aidan has his hands full with a problem created at Bishop’s request. Sally remembers the details that led to her death. Josh learns the truth about the night that led to his change.

episodes.name: It Takes Two to Make a Thing Go Wrong
episodes.overview: Aidan receives a “video postcard” from an old friend. Sally takes Aidan up on his offer to “take care of her problem.” Josh’s sister moves in with them which causes problems for the roommates. Josh goes on a date with a nurse from the hospital.

episodes.name: I See Your True Colors... And That's Why I Hate You
episodes.overview: Josh has an odd and interesting homecoming. Sally attempts to protect Bridget from Danny but fails. Aidan deals with the aftermath of Marcus' attack.

episodes.name: Children Shouldn't Play with Undead Things
episodes.overview: Sally gets bombarded by ghosts at the hospital; Josh is hesitant about his date with Nora.

episodes.name: I Want You Back (From the Dead)
episodes.overview: Bernie is seriously injured in a car accident leaving Aidan to make a tough decision. Josh wants to slow down his relationship with Nora. Sally meets an old crush, who is also a ghost.

episodes.name: Dog Eat Dog
episodes.overview: Josh is forced into "dog" fighting. Aidan is forced to play the good "son," while the elders are in town, and Sally has to act as a mediator between the two.

episodes.name: Going Dutch
episodes.overview: Rebecca walks out on Aidan; Josh has romantic troubles; Marcus is worried that Bishop suspects he is a traitor and Sally faces off with an exorcist.

episodes.name: You're the One That I Haunt
episodes.overview: After his break from the Family, Aidan is afraid that Bishop will try to hurt him and his friends. At the hospital, he encounters a former lover, who has come to the hospital to die. Josh runs into Nora, and is afraid about possible complications in her pregnancy. Meanwhile, Sally finally finds a way to hurt Danny.

episodes.name: A Funny Thing Happened on the Way to Me Killing You
episodes.overview: Nora finds out the truth about Josh; Sally misses her "door", but gains new powers; Aidan has a final showdown with Bishop, with surprising results. We also see how Aidan and Josh first met.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Aidan was a Revolutionary War soldier who sacrificed himself to vampires to spare his men. Now, some 260 years later, he is still struggling to escape the orbit of his powerful mentor, Bishop. Josh was a promising medical student forced to abandon his family and future after a werewolf attack left him cursed. And Sally, happily engaged before her tragic death, must now figure out how to move on as a ghost.

episodes.name: Turn This Mother Out
episodes.overview: Aidan deals with vampires; Josh prepares to reenter medical school; Sally's powers strengthen.

episodes.name: Do You Really Want to Hurt Me?
episodes.overview: Josh deals with his relationship with Nora; Aidan helps Suren; Sally discovers new ghostly powers.

episodes.name: All Out of Blood
episodes.overview: Josh and Nora prepare for another "change"; Sally looks into reincarnation; Aidan dates a human.

episodes.name: (I Loathe You) For Sentimental Reasons
episodes.overview: Aidan tries not to go back to his old lifestyle; Josh meets a brother and sister werewolf; Sally connects with an old friend.

episodes.name: Addicted to Love
episodes.overview: Aidan's relationship is taken to a new level; Josh's search for a werewolf cure continues.

episodes.name: Mama Said There'd Be Decades Like These
episodes.overview: Aidan is hounded by his past; Sally finds out her mother is dying.

episodes.name: The Ties That Blind
episodes.overview: Sally finds out who has been haunting her; Josh tries to reunite with Nora.

episodes.name: I've Got You Under Your Skin
episodes.overview: Josh and Julia face their past; Sally is offered a job; Aidan and Suren get rid of Boston's fringe vampires.

episodes.name: When I Think About You I Shred Myself
episodes.overview: Aidan tries to save Henry's life; Sally learns more about the reaper; old friends visit Josh.

episodes.name: Dream Reaper
episodes.overview: Sally becomes locked in a dream world; Aidan, Josh and Zoe fight for their life.

episodes.name: Don't Fear the Scott
episodes.overview: Aidan and Suren look forward to their future together, Josh chooses between Julia and Nora; Sally tries to fix one of the lives that she ruined.

episodes.name: Partial Eclipse of the Heart
episodes.overview: Sally tries to convince Zoe not to turn her back on her gift; Josh is not sure if he should tell Julia the truth about himself; Aidan tries to make a life with Suren.

episodes.name: It's My Party and I'll Die If I Want to
episodes.overview: Sally's mother returns; Aidan wants to kill Mother; Josh intends to kill Ray.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Aidan tries to steer a leaderless Boston while resisting his deadlier vampire instincts as he finds himself tempted and tormented by a figure from his past. Sally must face the consequences of missing her door while figuring out how to navigate life on earth as a ghost. Josh searches for a cure for his condition while struggling to maintain his relationship with Nora and, like the rest of his roommates, trying to build a future for himself beyond simply being a monster.

episodes.name: It's a Shame About Ray
episodes.overview: Aidan resurfaces to find the vampire community has changed greatly; Sally struggles to free herself from limbo; Josh and Nora stand up to Ray.

episodes.name: (Dead) Girls Just Wanna Have Fun
episodes.overview: Sally flirts with an old acquaintance; Aidan searches for blood; Josh considers taking his relationship with Nora further.

episodes.name: The Teens They Are a Changin'
episodes.overview: Nora and Josh meet a teenage runaway; Sally tries to make things right with Troy; Aidan and Henry search for clean blood.

episodes.name: I'm So Lonesome I Could Die
episodes.overview: Sally reaches out to Aidan; Josh helps Aidan locate untainted blood.

episodes.name: Get Outta My Dreams, Get Into My Mouth
episodes.overview: Liam tries to pit Josh and Nora against Aidan; Sally gets closer with Max; Kenny suspects that Aidan may be a vampire.

episodes.name: What's Blood Got to Do With It?
episodes.overview: Sally tries to make things right after she encounters someone from her past; Kenny spurs Aidan's memories.

episodes.name: One is Silver and the Other Pagan
episodes.overview: Josh reconnects with Emily; Aidan's blood supply is jeopardized; Sally gets in touch with a friend from her past.

episodes.name: Your Body is a Condemned Wonderland
episodes.overview: Liam returns with an agenda for Aidan; Sally tries to figure out what's wrong with her body; Nick hides a secret.

episodes.name: Of Mice And Wolfmen
episodes.overview: Aidan remembers his wife; Sally struggles with a hunger that she hasn't felt before; Josh and Nora meet an older wolf.

episodes.name: For Those About to Rot
episodes.overview: Stevie asks Sally to kill him; and Aidan takes Kat out on a date, during which he's overwhelmed by memories of his wife and son.

episodes.name: If I Only Had Raw Brain
episodes.overview: Josh and Nora search for Donna; Aidan breaks Kenny out of the hospital.

episodes.name: Always a Bridesmaid, Never Alive
episodes.overview: Josh, Aidan, and Sally battle Donna. Kenny wakes up -- but things don't go as expected.

episodes.name: Ruh Roh
episodes.overview: Josh and Nora face Liam; Sally deals with the outcome of her showdown with Donna; Aidan must deal with Kenny.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: Returning from limbo leaves Sally with more baggage than she bargained for, as well as new abilities that prove to be both a blessing and a curse. Josh deals with the consequences of attempting to lift his werewolf curse and his life is further complicated when an ominous visitor comes to Boston looking for him and Nora. Aidan resurfaces from being grounded and finds the vampire community vastly changed; he must find a new approach to feeding that will change his life forever.

episodes.name: Old Dogs, New Tricks
episodes.overview: Josh is trapped inside his wolf as Nora and Aidan struggle to contain him; Sally finds herself imprisoned in a mysterious place with Donna.

episodes.name: That Time of the Month
episodes.overview: Aidan and Kat take their relationship to the next level; Aidan encounters someone from his past; Sally uses her newly acquired powers to help Nora try to free Josh.

episodes.name: Lil' Smokie
episodes.overview: Aidan learns there's a new vampire boss in town; Josh's new life proves problematic; Sally's newly acquired powers send her to a strange place.

episodes.name: The Panic Womb
episodes.overview: Aidan and Kat's relationship continues to grow; Josh and Nora meet a couple; Sally tries to solve the mystery of the girl she calls "Lil' Smokie".

episodes.name: Pack It Up, Pack It In
episodes.overview: Aidan tries to forget a recent loss; Josh and Nora throw a baby shower; Sally learns about her new abilities and what they mean in regards to her future.

episodes.name: Cheater of the Pack
episodes.overview: Josh wakes up to a surprising discovery; Aidan reconnects with Suzanna and remembers the life he once had; someone from Sally's past resurfaces.

episodes.name: Gallows Humor
episodes.overview: Sally goes to Donna for help; Aidan and Suzanna come face to face with the truth about their past; Josh and Nora seek help from an old friend.

episodes.name: Rewind, Rewind
episodes.overview: Sally learns that by changing the past to match the present, she has changed her and the roommates' futures.

episodes.name: Too Far, Fast Forward!
episodes.overview: Sally realizes that the only way to make things right is to transport to the present and seeking the help of an old foe.

episodes.name: Oh Don't You Die For Me
episodes.overview: Josh struggles to get Nora back; Aidan and Sally's friendship turns into something more, even though his relationship with Suzanna has taken a new turn.

episodes.name: Ramona the Pest
episodes.overview: Aidan helps Kenny get out of town; Sally and Nora help Josh conquer his wolf.

episodes.name: House Hunting
episodes.overview: The roommates discover they are not the only ones having a hard time leaving the house.

episodes.name: There Goes the Neighborhood Part III
episodes.overview: Sally makes a major sacrifice to keep her vision from coming true; Aidan fights to destroy the evil spirit; Josh and Nora think carefully about their future.

4.name: Season 4
4.overview: Sally struggles to contain her newly acquired powers and break free of Donna's hold on her, while also seeking out the truth behind a murder mystery that haunts her when her powers are used.
